text: The Mazanderani people, also known as the Tabari people or Tapuri people, are an Iranian people.Area handbook for Iran, Harvey Henry Smith, American University (Washington, D.C.), Foreign Area Studies, page 89Academic American Encyclopedia By Grolier Incorporated, page 294The World Book Encyclopedia, World Book, Inc, 2000, page 401 == References == Category:Ethnic groups in Iran Category:Pages created with the Article Wizard from 2024
title: Mazanderani people
